name: Gelato
description: Gelato is an Innovative Utility Fee Token built on PulseChain that combines Hyper Deflation, Deep Liquidity Webs and User Rewards. - Gelato is the very first token to buy and burn SolidX - Gelato rewards users with SolidX and pHex - Gelato is Hyper Deflationary - Gelato has a 3 phase liquidity strategy with deep, adaptive, intelligent webs designed for volume, scarcity, & continuous price performance. - Gelato has a roadmap and strategic plan for years to come with future builds and dynamic utility, regardless of market conditions.
